桵字的基本解释

桵
ruí
〔白桵〕古书上说的一种小树，丛生，茎上有刺，果实紫红色，可以吃。

桵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ruí］
［《廣韻》儒隹切，平脂，日。］
木名。白桵，即棫。

桵字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　桵； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页527第09
【唐韻】如錐切【集韻】【韻會】如追切，?音蕤。【說文】白桵，棫也。或作㮃。【爾雅·郭註】白㮃，小木也。詳棫字註。

桵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
桵字的起名意思

古书上说的一种小树，即：白桵。

桵
Basic explanation of words
桵
ruí
[Bai Xun] A kind of small tree mentioned in ancient books. It grows in clusters with thorns on the stems and the fruit is purple-red, which can be eaten.
桵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ruí］
["Guangyun" Confucianism cut, Pingzhi, Japanese. ]
Wooden name. Bai Xie means Xie.
桵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　桵; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 527 09
[Tang Yun] Such as conical cutting [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Such as chasing cutting,? [Said the text] Bai Xie, Xie Ye. Or as 㮃. 【Erya·Guo Note】White 㮃, Xiao Mu also. Detailed note of the word.
桵

Name meaning
A kind of small tree mentioned in ancient books, namely: Baixun.
ruǐ
сущ.* дерево с белой крепкой древесиной
